params.name: token_ids
params.description: List of tokenized input ids. Can be obtained using the __call__ method.

params.name: skip_special_tokens
params.description: Whether or not to remove special tokens in the decoding.

params.name: clean_up_tokenization_spaces
params.description: Whether or not to clean up the tokenization spaces. If None, will default toself.clean_up_tokenization_spaces (available in the tokenizer_config).

params.name: truncate_before_pattern
params.description: A list of regular expression strings that will be used to truncate the returned string. This can beused to remove extra pieces of code (e.g. truncate if observing a comment symbol # at the beginningof a new line). An example pattern could be `[^#, re.escape(<|endoftext|>), ^,
